Flow.description: - Dec 2 2019: For Orgs on Junction Linkage, if at least one BLI is collab/sub-contractor, then set Relationship Type as Funding Body - Added deletion - Name of Junction Linkage record is set based on the org's name - Added null checker - Added fault checker - Added information for La Trobe Orgs: In-Kind, Cash Internal or Cash External - Removed the pre-population of the amount suggested - Deduplication v2 -Updated the screens to display the Funding Details name change. -Saved as new after testing on 27-Nov
Flow.label: Budget: Junction Linkage Sync

value.stringValue: Oops...please add Budget Line Items to your Budget before performing this step.
Note: This process will copy Budget Line Items to linked Project Proposal as Funding Details records. Any existing Funding Detail records will be replaced once the process is successful.
